strategy: Apply a gradient boosting machine (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with tuned hyperparameters using Bayesian optimization, focusing on feature interactions and tree depth to capture non-linear relationships in the data. Include categorical variables through one-hot encoding with a careful handling of high-cardinality features via target encoding. Normalize numerical features using robust scaling to reduce sensitivity to outliers. Evaluate with cross-validation and optimize R2 via early stopping.
